attributes.action: Allow the Wirral Air show to go ahead.
attributes.additional_details: Not only have Wirral Council decided to postpone the event. They decided not to allow the traditional Egg run, they also won't allow the Wirral Show to run anymore. Wirral Council have received criticism that they don't not provide enough activities for young children over the summer break.
attributes.background: Wirral Borough Council have now decided to ask organisers of Wirral Air Show to postpone their event until next year despite the organisers getting confirmations from air display teams.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Wirral council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: https://www.wirral.gov.uk/about-council/have-your-say/petitions
